title: CEO Jensen Huang Advocates for Diverse Skill Acquisition Amidst AI Advancements
description: Amidst the ongoing discourse surrounding the future of coding in light of advancing artificial intelligence technologies, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently reiterated his perspective on the matter. Addressing concerns raised following his previous remarks on the purported “death of coding,” Huang emphasized the evolving nature of skill acquisition in contemporary society. Speaking at Nvidia’s GTC […]
